nodes.text: Darth Vader's Security Force were elite troopers of the Galactic Empire that were visually identical to snowtroopers and the Vader's Special Force Trooper, only having red-colored armor instead of the usual white armor. The Security Force, alongside the Special Force Troopers, were led by Darth Vader during the Occupation of Bespin. Their equipment also included shields, grenades, and E-Web blasters, the former being similar in nature to those used by the grenadier troopers.
